revised_title: Second List of Nebulae and Clusters Observed with the Royal Society's Spectroscope
tldr: In this article, John Herschel reports his observations of nebulae and clusters using the Royal Society's spectroscope in Bangalore. He discusses the challenges of observing during the rainy season and the difficulties in identifying gaseous nebulae. He also provides a list of planetary nebulae that exhibit monochromatic spectra and a list of nebulae believed to have continuous spectra.
